question: Following representation P, Q and R denote few steps of Griffith Experiment. Identify the correct one(s).
P. R strain -> Inject into mice -> Mice die
Q. S strain (Heat killed) -> Inject into mice -> Mice die
R. R strain -> Inject into mice -> Mice live
explanation: In Griffith's experiment, R strain is non-virulent (mice live). P is incorrect because R strain does not kill mice. Q is incorrect because heat-killed S strain does not kill mice. Only R is correct.
